location: 421 W College St., Los Angeles, CA 90012.
description: A mural project of the Youth Leadership Council of Chinatown and Lincoln Heights in conjunction with Steven Wong. Dedicated to the diverse community of Chinatown. made possible with the help of Chinatown Service Center, ArtscorpsLA, L. A. Board of Public Works, Jimmie Joe, Mr. Chang's and Mr. Tam's Sensational, Students from Castelar and 99th Street Schools, UCLA's Asian Pacific American Labor Studies Class, and Hathaway Family Resource Center.
